description: Fresh egg pasta for many pasta recipes.

directions.step: Pour the flour on a work surface (a wooden board on the counter works well).
Make a well in the center of the flour.
Crack eggs into the well and add the water and the salt.
With a fork mix eggs and water and begin mixing in flour.
Continue doing this, taking more and more of the flour from around the egg mixture.
Once it gets too hard to do with a fork, start hand-working the dough.
Knead the dough until uniform, soft and resilient.
Wrap in cling film and place in refrigerator for about 15-30 minutes.
